definitions: a designer of fashionable styles of clothing

examples.text: a collection of 40s-inspired shapes from a leading stylist

shortDefinitions: designer of fashionable styles of clothing

examples.text: she had her hair done in a mass of curls by a stylist in Paris

definitions: a person whose job is to arrange and coordinate food, clothes, etc. in a stylish and attractive way in photographs or films.
shortDefinitions: person whose job is to arrange and coordinate food

definitions: a writer noted for taking great pains over their writing style

examples.text: the letter was written by a famous stylist

shortDefinitions: writer noted for taking great pains over their writing style

definitions: (in sports or music) a person who performs with style

examples.text: stylist Pohan took the lead in the first round

shortDefinitions: (in sport or music) person who performs with style
